channel.title: Midi in - I'm lost
channel.description:
Hi
Just took the axoloti out of the drawer after a few years. I thought it could make a sweet tone generator for my linnstrument.
I grabbed a fresh axoliti install from github (im on linux/debian), build axoloti (the patcher, I guess) flashed the firmware, and the patcher starts with no errors. I have masic audio out.
I also have midi in showing up in the midi in put monitor, but I cant seem to get any midi into a live patch. Any suggestions what I should look for, and maybe a super simple midi-in + debug patch?
Also: there seems to be two mpe objects, are people using them or should I rather build everything from basic objects?

item.title: Midi in - I'm lost
item.dc:creator: @a773
item.description:
@a773 wrote:

Thanks for getting back! Yeah, I had the midi/in object, it just didn't output anything....

After a reboot of computer everything seems to be working as expected.

Now on to see if the mpe object is broken or I'm stupid....

Thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: Midi in - I'm lost
item.dc:creator: @TTotelka
item.description:
@TTotelka wrote:

Sorry if this seems basic, but have you put a midi/in object into your patch?

Read full topic
